1.content:
Name: The Valkyrie (V for short)
Secret Identity: Alexis "Lexi" Henrietta von Reinhouser
Age: 20
Powers: You can do whatever you want, and you have no restraint, body transformation, Immortality, Super Strength, etc., Absorption (Well copying really) of the powers of other Meta-humans through physical contact with them. Currently, You are a Horsemen of Apocalypse: War. You carry the Blade of Armageddon and have an ethereal demon horse named Ruin, he is black and has a mane and hooves of fire.
Weaknesses: You are strongly attracted to women's feet
Other Info: You are 6'3, blonde hair, always in a ponytail, blue eyes, Caucasian (German). You pretty much just wear a black spandex suit and combat boots.
Feet: Size 12, nails unpainted
Personality: Easily angered, but have quite the submissive nature, but also violent and sadistic tendencies at times
Family Relations: Leah: Twin Sister, Anna "Elana": Younger Sister, Scarlet: Godmother, Valerie: Grandmother (Deceased), Heather: Mother (Deceased), Tom: Older Brother, Steve: Father

Power Level Overview

Within the Z Team Emily has designed a system to rank each and every member by their overall power level. It goes from Class I to Class V with Class I being Apocalypse level, Class II being extremely powerful, Class III being average superpowers IV being slightly above average human being, and Class V being average human being. Horsemen of Apocalypse are automatically Class I or II, with their original powers influencing their placement. Things like immortality give high placement. Raw power and skill level also give high placement.

Class I: Demonica, Lexi

Class II: Leah, Shelby, Jackie, Desdemona, Scarlet, Chelsea, Anna "Elana", Tori, Emily, Addy, Jenny, Penance, Rose

Class III: Hinohana, Alice, Phoebe, 24

Class IV: Ally, Edy, Petra, Vanessa, Jane

Class V: Stacy, Nicolette

Restricted Abilities

You've decided that certain team members have abilities that shouldn't be used all willy nilly. To use these abilities they have to get clearance from you first.

Anna: Halloween Cannon: Charges up an orange Jack O'lantern shaped hex ball. She launches it and it explodes like a small nuke. Blast Range: 0.1 miles

Emily: Tactical Nuke: Launches a small nuclear warhead from the base to her target, nuff said. Blast Range: 10 miles

Scarlet: Blood Sport: Unleashes her inner Vampire, going full on feral on anything unfortunate enough to be in her way...

Rose: Not Dead Yet: Allows herself to be killed, only to revive and literally stab her opponents in the back. She has a special knife with the word "Backstabber" carved into the handle.

Stacy: Cheer Squad: Calls in for back up. Stacy uses a device invented by Emily to teleport in a Cheer Squad, who then follow Stacy to literally just beat the shit out of whatever's in their way.

Demonica: Armaggeddon: Makes fire rain from the sky. You have to monitor her closely as she sometimes gets way out of hand with this one. Blast Range: Worldwide, has no effect on the team

Edy: Bulletstorm: Fires a bunch of bullets from a 50 cal. machine gun and makes them spin in a tornado-like pattern. She then sends the tornado at her opponent.

Leah: The Reaper: Uses her scythe to slice open an opponent and harvest their soul. Game over.

Jane: Mini-nuke: Launches a Snickers bar sized nuke from her wrist gauntlet. Has armor piercing capability. Blast Range: 15 feet

Shelby: Cataclysm: Defies the Richter scale and causes massive rocks to erupt from the ground, crushing, impaling, and otherwise destroying anything caught in it. Range: As far as Shelby can see to control her powers effectively.

Jackie: Meltdown: Disables all the restrictors Emily placed on her and unleashes her full radioactive fury, melting, disintegrating, and killing anything non meta-human. Range: 100 miles

Tori: El Dia de los Muertos: Summons legions of the undead to swarm her opponent.

Desdemona: Succubi's Charm: Seduces her opponent and then sucks out all of their life force.

Ally: Martyr: Uses her powers to insta-heal anyone wounded and revive anyone recently deceased. Ally falls into a 7 day coma after using this ability.

Several of these abilities can be used in Tandem to increase the power of both attacks.

Demonica + Jackie: Nuclear Armageddon

Desdemona + Leah: Once Screwed, Twice Damned

Scarlet + Stacy: Blitz Rush

Edy + Jane: Two Woman Army

Rose + Tori: Undead Surprise

Shelby + Anna: All Hallows Eve

Anna + Emily: Science and Majic

You start twitching and spazzing and feel something inside your heart change. DEATH... Leah, I know that you're the Grim Reaper and have powers, hold her down... You go to the kitchen... You come back with a large butcher knife in your hand. Let's see, to slit your throat? Nah, too quick. Stab you in the heart? Ha ha, that's symbolic. Gauge your eyes out? No, I want you to see this.
